author: Samantha Netkin
title: Priyanka Chopra's People's Choice Awards Look Isn't a Dress - It's an Optical Illusion
text:
Priyanka Chopra Sally LaPointe People's Choice Awards 2017 Priyanka Chopra's People's Choice Awards Look Isn't a Dress — It's an Optical Illusion January 18, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Priyanka Chopra's People's Choice Awards Look Isn't a Dress — It's an Optical Illusion 
Priyanka Chopra is taking award season by storm. After a gorgeous appearance at the Golden Globes , the Quantico actress walked the red carpet at the People's Choice Awards (even after sustaining a concussion on the set of her hit series ). 
At first glimpse, we thought her peach Sally LaPointe look was just another stunning dress. It wasn't until she twirled for the cameras that we noticed she was actually sporting a strapless high-low top and matching fringe skirt. Basically, we were floored. She paired the set with Schutz heels and simple jewelry. Read on to see her pull off the optical illusion for yourself. Related:
